description: An AWS Support App resource that creates, updates, reads, and deletes a customer's account alias.

AccountAlias.description: An account alias associated with a customer's account.
AccountAlias.markdownDescription:
An account alias associated with a customer's account.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 30  
Pattern: ^[\w\- ]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

AccountAliasResourceId.description: Unique identifier representing an alias tied to an account
AccountAliasResourceId.markdownDescription:
Unique identifier representing an alias tied to an account

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 29  
Maximum Length: 29  
Pattern: ^[\w\- ]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
